abstract: Brookly Nets owner Mikhail D Prokhorov is seeking potential buyers for franchise only five years after purchasing it; is likely to receive at least several times his $223 million investment.
lead_paragraph: Prokhorov, who owns 80 percent of the team and 45 percent of its arena, would have a chance to turn his $223 million investment into a profit of $1 billion or more.

byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting.

snippet: Prokhorov, who owns 80 percent of the team and 45 percent of its arena, would have a chance to turn his $223 million investment into a profit of $1 billion or more.

headline.main: Mikhail Prokhorov Is Said to Be Seeking Potential Buyers for Nets
headline.print_headline: Prokhorov Is Said to Be Seeking Potential Buyers for the Nets
